title: Three Hundred Big Boys
desc: A $300 refund for all taxpayers results in a series of interconnected stories, following the Planet Express crew's endeavors to spend their money. Fry recklessley decides to spend his refund on 100 cups of coffee and Leela plans to swin with a whale known as Mushu. Bender steals a $10,000 Cuban cigar and Zoidberg has some trouble on deciding how to spend his refund. Kif spends his rebate on gifts for Amy but is devastated when one of them is lost
